summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for The Haze Trust at Deutsche Bank for the month of October 2017. It details the beginning and ending balances, deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, highlighting significant transactions including a large funds transfer.

persons.name: Cynthia Rodriguez
persons.context: Cynthia Rodriguez is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Account Summary for The Haze Trust
events.description: Summary of account balances and transactions for The Haze Trust at Deutsche Bank for October 2017.

events.title: Funds Transfer
events.description: A significant funds transfer of $13,000,000.00 was made from The Haze Trust account.

keyFacts: The Haze Trust had a beginning balance of $54,254,250.84 and an ending balance of $52,503,667.84 as of October 31, 2017.
A total deposit of $11,249,417.00 was credited to the account during October 2017.
A significant outgoing funds transfer of $13,000,000.00 occurred on October 26, 2017.
Cynthia Rodriguez is listed as a contact for account inquiries.
The document contains confidential information as per Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure.
